TEI.2.document_title: J A Mexia to Stephen F Austin, 07-08-2010

barker_notes.barker_summary: José Antonio Mexia to Austin, Matamoros, July 8, 1832. Requesting Austin to accompany his expedition to Texas to assist in restoring order. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 813
